WEIGHTYCONTAINERS.SettingGMOnlyConfigHin: If checked, only the Game Master can see and use the weight reduction configuration button on container sheets.
WEIGHTYCONTAINERS.InvalidPercentage: Please enter a valid percentage between 0 and 100.
WEIGHTYCONTAINERS.CapacityExceeded: Cannot add/increase item. Container '{containerName}' capacity exceeded.
WEIGHTYCONTAINERS.CapacityWouldExceed: Cannot add/increase item. Container '{containerName}' capacity would be exceeded.
WEIGHTYCONTAINERS.SettingCapacityMessage: The notification message displayed when trying to exceed container capacity. Leave empty to use default system message.
WEIGHTYCONTAINERS.SettingCurrencyDivisor: Number of coins equivalent to 1 pound (or 0.5 kg in metric). Default is 50.
WEIGHTYCONTAINERS.SettingProgressSelecto: CSS selectors for container progress bars. Modify only if using custom sheets (e.g., Plutonium or Item Piles).
WEIGHTYCONTAINERS.SettingValueSelectorsH: CSS selectors for container weight value displays. Modify only if using custom sheets.
